TEXT.TITLE: WASTE MANAGEMENT <WMX> VOTES SPLIT, UPS PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Waste Management Corp said its board voted a two-for-one stock split payable April 21, record March 30. In other action, Waste Management directors approved an increase in the quarterly dividend to 18 cts from 14 cts, payable April three, record March 18. Reuter
